translations: n．着色，色彩：物体或表面的颜色或色调。
· The colorations of the leaves change with the seasons.
树叶的色彩随着季节的变化而变化。

sentences.sentence: At the end of this time, HDTMA-bentonite in the aqueous solutions of the textile dyes showed the dark colorations of the original solutions.
sentences.translation: 在这次结束的时候，HDTMA -织的颜料水解决的膨土表示了最初的解决黑暗着色。
